Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The GUI class creates and maintains the graphic interface through which the user interacts with the program
    Author:
    David Newell, David Langford, Karsten Babin, Robert Goldfarb
